Reference

Help

rfacts-package

rfacts: interface to FACTS on Unix-like systems

Configuration

reset_rfacts_paths()

Reset system dependency info

rfacts_paths()

Read paths to rfacts system dependencies

rfacts_sitrep()

Check configuration of system dependencies

Top-level functions

run_facts()

Run FACTS

run_flfll()

Generate param files to prepare for trial simulations

run_engine()

Run trial simulations

Linux engines

run_engine_aipf_contin() run_engine_aipf_dichot() run_engine_aipf_tte() run_engine_contin() run_engine_crm() run_engine_dichot() run_engine_multep() run_engine_tte()

Engine-specific trial simulation functions

CSV files

get_csv_files()

List FACTS-generated CSV files

overwrite_csv_files()

Overwrite FACTS CSV output files

read_patients() read_weeks() read_mcmc() read_s1_mcmc() read_s1_weeks() read_s1_patients() read_s2_patients() read_s2_weeks() read_s2_mcmc() read_master_mcmc() read_master_patients() read_master_weeks() read_cohorts() read_simulations() read_csv_special()

Read trial simulation results

FACTS files

get_facts_file_example()

Locate an example FACTS file

get_facts_scenarios()

List the names of simulation scenarios

get_facts_version()

Get FACTS version matching your FACTS file

get_facts_versions()

List supported FACTS versions

get_facts_engine()

Get the FACTS engine function matching your FACTS file

Param files

prep_param_files()

Arrange the param files for the engines ahead of time.

get_param_files()

List the paths to the param files

get_param_dirs()

List the directories containing param files
